trans-unit.source: Represents the enveloped signature transform for an XML digital signature as defined by the W3C.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta la trasformazione della firma protetta per una firma digitale XML definito da di W3C.

trans-unit.source: The XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform class removes the <`Signatur`e> element from an XML document before the digest is computed.
trans-unit.target: La classe XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform consente di rimuovere il `Signatur`e > elemento da un documento XML prima del calcolo il digest.

trans-unit.source: With this transform, you can sign and verify all elements of an XML document except the XML digital signature elements.
trans-unit.target: Con questa trasformazione, è possibile accedere e verificare tutti gli elementi di un documento XML, ad eccezione di quelle della firma digitale XML.

trans-unit.source: Although you can create and insert a signature into an XML document, verifying the modified document using the embedded signature will fail because the document now has additional elements.
trans-unit.target: Sebbene sia possibile creare e inserire una firma di un documento XML, la verifica del documento modificato utilizzando la firma incorporata avrà esito negativo perché il documento ha ora elementi aggiuntivi.

trans-unit.source: This transform removes the <`Signatur`e> element and allows you to verify the document using its original form.
trans-unit.target: Questa trasformazione rimuove il `Signatur`e > elemento e consente di verificare il documento nel formato originale.

trans-unit.source: Use the XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform class whenever you create an enveloped signature.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la classe XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform quando si crea una firma protetta.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the enveloped signature transform, see Section 6.6.4 of the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla trasformazione firma protetta, vedere la sezione 6.6.4 della specifica XMLDSIG, disponibile tramite il W3C in www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> class with comments, if specified.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"> </xref> classe con commenti, se specificato.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include comments; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per includere commenti. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns an XML representation of the parameters of an <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object that are suitable to be included as subelements of an XMLDSIG <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce una rappresentazione XML dei parametri di un <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"> </xref> oggetti che possono essere inclusi come sottoelementi di un XMLDSIG <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: A list of the XML nodes that represent the transform-specific content needed to describe the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object in an XMLDSIG <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Un elenco dei nodi XML che rappresentano il contenuto specifico della trasformazione necessario per descrivere corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"> </xref> oggetto in un XMLDSIG <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Returns the output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'output dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The type of the returned object must be <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo dell'oggetto restituito deve essere <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>

trans-unit.source: The output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: L'output dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The containing XML document is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: È il documento XML contenente <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object of type <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'output dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"> </xref> oggetto di tipo <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The type of the returned object must be <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo dell'oggetto restituito deve essere <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>

trans-unit.source: The type of the output to return.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo di output da restituire.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref> is the only valid type for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref>è l'unico tipo valido per questo parametro.

trans-unit.source: The output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object of type <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'output dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"> </xref> oggetto di tipo <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The type parameter is not an object.
trans-unit.target: Il type parametro non è un oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of types that are valid inputs to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform.LoadInput*> method of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una matrice di tipi di input valido per il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform.LoadInput*>metodo dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"> </xref> oggetto.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform.LoadInput*>

trans-unit.source: The valid input types to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform> are <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, and <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.
trans-unit.target: Tipi di input validi per <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform>sono <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>e <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform>

trans-unit.source: An array of valid input types for the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object; you can pass only objects of one of these types to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform.LoadInput*> method of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Una matrice di tipi di input validi per l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"> </xref> oggetto; è possibile passare solo oggetti di uno di questi tipi per il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform.LoadInput*>metodo dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"> </xref> oggetto.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform.LoadInput*>

trans-unit.source: Parses the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref> as transform-specific content of a <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref> element and configures the internal state of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object to match the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Consente di analizzare specificato <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"> </xref> come contenuto specifico della trasformazione di un <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""> </xref> elemento e configura lo stato interno dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"> </xref> oggetto in modo che corrisponda il <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Because no transform-specific content is defined for <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform>, a call to this method does not change the state of the transform.
trans-unit.target: Perché non è definito alcun contenuto specifico della trasformazione per <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform>, una chiamata a questo metodo non modifica lo stato della trasformazione.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref> to load into the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"> </xref> per caricare in corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Loads the specified input into the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Carica l'input specificato in corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The type of the input object must be one of the types in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform.InputTypes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo dell'oggetto di input deve essere uno dei tipi di <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform.InputTypes%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform.InputTypes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The input to load into the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Input da caricare in corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The obj parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The obj parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The containing XML document is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: È il documento XML contenente <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of types that are possible outputs from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform.GetOutput*> methods of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una matrice di tipi che sono possibili output il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform.GetOutput*>metodi dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"> </xref> oggetto.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform.GetOutput*>

trans-unit.source: The valid output types for <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform> are <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> and <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>.
trans-unit.target: I tipi di output valido per <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform>sono <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>e <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform>

trans-unit.source: An array of valid output types for the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object; only objects of one of these types are returned from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform.GetOutput*> methods of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Una matrice di tipi di output valido per l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"> </xref> oggetto; solo gli oggetti di uno di questi tipi vengono restituiti dal <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform.GetOutput*>metodi dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform"> </xref> oggetto.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigEnvelopedSignatureTransform.GetOutput*>
